Title: MindDrone
Description: Control the AR Drone through movements using the Kinect.
HomeWiki:
MindDrone : Control your Drone through Kinect

Source code contains wrappers for Mindset ThinkGear headset and Kinect using the OpenNI SDK in the first release, we'll be releasing a different version using the official Windows SDK

This project is developed and maintained by CampusID university students.

The code is still not fully commented; but this will happen as we shift to the official Kinect SDK.

Visit our lab blog: http://galicom.ieid.eu
